welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Terrace Heights, where the charm of small-town America meets the beauty of the Pacific Northwest. Get ready to explore our quaint streets, breathtaking views, and friendly community. Enjoy your stay and let us show you why our city is known for its warmth and hospitality."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yakima Air Terminal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Yakima Air Terminal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments.
